metadata.name: TURANDOT
metadata.description:
At the very borders of the sacred mystical world sits one of its eternal guardians, Turandot, who changes her appearance.
Don't let the shining gaze of this creature seduce you.  Because it will pierce your soul with its gaze and look into your very essence.
Do not be afraid - if your spirit is pure, all the worlds of the universe will open before you.

Do not fear earthly wars. Do not become accustomed to the earthly world - it is only one of the possible realities. And your path is much longer, and one day you will stand before a guardian. 

⏃

"Turandot" speaks to everyone, listen and look closely.
A very special, mesmerizing painting created in oil / acrylic on canvas 60x40 cm in 2017.

⏄

Size: 2160  x  3190
Sound: 320 kbps
Format: MOV
